title: The Reserved Daughter Of a Duke And The Cold-Headed Emperor – The Child I Picked Up In My Past Life Had Become an Emperor - Novel Updates
tags: Abandoned Children   Abusive Characters   Adapted to Manga   Adopted Children   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Fated Lovers   Female Protagonist   First Love   Handsome Male Lead   Loner Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mob Protagonist   Monsters   Nobles   Older Love Interests   Possessive Characters   Quiet Characters   Reincarnation   Royalty   Shy Characters   Tomboyish Female Lead   Ugly to Beautiful
author: Bekio   ベキオ
description:
The ruthless Emperor Alexei was abandoned as a child in a forest of magical beasts. There he was picked up by a human woman who looked like a monster. The woman took care of Alexei, raised him, and together they lived happily.

However three years later, when Alexei is brought back as a prince, the woman was killed by the knights.

The prince grows up in despair and then spends the rest of his life fighting in battle before he was crowned as an emperor.

Meanwhile, the woman, who was called a monster, was reborn and meets the emperor as a Duke’s Daughter.>
